description: Try our easy to follow BBQ Pork With Sweet Potato Bruschetta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bruschetta & crostini,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sweet potato,Egg free,Pork,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: BBQ Pork With Sweet Potato Bruschetta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup flat leaf parsley leaves, roughly chopped
500g sweet potato, cut into 1.5cm thick diagonal slices
0.5 cup hickory & brown sugar barbecue sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Combine sauce, lime juice and oil in a ceramic dish. Add cutlets, turning to coat with marinade. Cover and marinate in the refrigerate for at least 30 minutes or longer if time permits.

Preheat oven to 180°C. Preheat a chargrill pan over medium heat. Remove cutlets from marinade and cook for 3 minutes each side or until charred. Transfer to a baking tray and place in oven for 8 minutes or until cooked through. Pour remaining marinade into a small saucepan and place over a medium heat. Bring to the boil and cook for 3 minutes.

Meanwhile, spray sweet potato slices with cooking oil spray. Cook sweet potato in a toaster until golden and tender (this may take 4-5 cycles). Repeat with remaining slices. Transfer to serving plates. Top with goat’s cheese and parsley. Serve with cutlets and sauce.
